title: Contract data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' This is a Contract resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Identifier' Unique identifier for this Contract or a derivative that references a Source Contract.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

url.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_url.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

version.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_version.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

legalState.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

instantiatesCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

instantiatesUri.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_instantiatesUri.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

contentDerivative.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

issued.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/dateTime' A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_issued.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

applies.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Period' A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

expirationType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

authority.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

domain.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

site.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Sites in which the contract is complied with,  exercised, or in force.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

_name.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_subtitle.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

alias.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' Alternative representation of the title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state., e.g., a domain specific contract number related to legislation.

items.description: Base definition for all elements in a resource.

author.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

scope.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

topicCodeableConcept.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

topicReference.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'Contract'

subType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' Sub-category for the Contract that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the Contract within the context of the Contract's scope.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

contentDefinition.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Contract_ContentDefinition' Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

term.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Contract_Term' One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

items.description: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

supportingInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Information that may be needed by/relevant to the performer in their execution of this term action.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

relevantHistory.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Contract definition, derivative, or instance, which identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the Contract.  The Provence.entity indicates the target that was changed in the update. http://build.fhir.org/provenance-definitions.html#Provenance.entity.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

signer.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Contract_Signer' Parties with legal standing in the Contract, including the principal parties, the grantor(s) and grantee(s), which are any person or organization bound by the contract, and any ancillary parties, which facilitate the execution of the contract such as a notary or witness.

items.description: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

friendly.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Contract_Friendly' The "patient friendly language" versionof the Contract in whole or in parts. "Patient friendly language" means the representation of the Contract and Contract Provisions in a manner that is readily accessible and understandable by a layperson in accordance with best practices for communication styles that ensure that those agreeing to or signing the Contract understand the roles, actions, obligations, responsibilities, and implication of the agreement.

items.description: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

legal.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Contract_Legal' List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.

items.description: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

rule.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Contract_Rule' List of Computable Policy Rule Language Representations of this Contract.

items.description: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

legallyBindingAttachment.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Attachment' For referring to data content defined in other formats.

legallyBindingReference.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.
